name: potoo
description: An actor model library for JavaScript.

scripts.build: rm -R lib; mkdir -p lib; ./node_modules/.bin/babel -D src -s inline -d lib
scripts.build-perf: rm -R lib/perf; mkdir -p lib; ./node_modules/.bin/babel -D perf -s inline -d lib/perf

author: Quenk Technologies (http://quenk.com)
